content: is christmas really complete without a few stockings hanging around how about adding a little geek chic to your festive cheer these stocking are designed to create that traditional festive with a little legend of zelda inspiration the materials required are listed below the yarn used to make them as pictured was red heart super saver acrylic yarn in in three colours green white and brown with scraps of yellow yarn for detailing you can even add some stitched triforce decoration whatever suits your mood materials required aran weight yarn green white and brown 5mm crochet hook stitch markers and pins yarn needle stitch knowledge required single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet tc = triple crochet slip st = slip_stitch decrease = single_crochet decrease blo = back loops only ** = a repeating stitch pattern measurements the completed piece measures approx 40 cm tall pattern notes stitches are written in standard us terms working in continuous rounds unless otherwise specified
